BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Application no. 20085275 HAK, an Urban Development Action Area Project known as Pacific/MacDougal, located in Community Board 16, Council District no. 41, Borough of Brooklyn.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, and pursuant to Section 696 of the General Municipal Law for an exemption from real property taxes.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
